Vlad: I am the Khan of Clan Wolf. The Clans live in a constant state 
of war and combat is the final test of everything. Through ritual 
trials, we achieve different goals. A Trial of Possession defines the 
prize as the property of the winning party. Does that help you to 
understand, quiaff?

posession?"
